body.name: men-ü High-Performance Shaving Cream w/UP TO 165 SHAVES, mens shaving cream with Long Lasting/Ultra-Concentrate Formula with Tea Tree oil/Lubricants & Moisturisers, shaving cream mens 3.3 fl oz.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 50 mins
features: ⭐ WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY – We partnered with Consumer Insight who asked 100+ men-ü Shave Cream users what they thought of their experience with the product. When asked about shave comfort. Not just comfortable but 91% say ‘VERY COMFORTBALE”.

🏆 HIGH PERFORMANCE – Only what is in contact with skin & blade matters! Get a better shave with this shave cream for men that provides a smooth ride w/ less resistance for your blade. One pump is enough! Use with or without a brush. UP TO 165 SHAVES!

❤️ FOUNDATION TO HEALTHY SKIN – A poor shave makes the skin susceptible to cuts, nicks & rashes. Deep cleanse after & you have what is probably the best preventative against spots and rashes, normally caused by dead surface skin cells blocking pores.

♻️ REFILLS – Handy ultra-concentrate refills available. 3R Grooming – Reduce with ultra-concentration, Reuse pump & over cap, Recycle much less. Up to 90% less packaging Vs aerosol shaving gel & foam products. 100ml so perfect travel shaving cream.

💈 TOP PROFESSIONAL MEN’S BRAND - Stocked by top salons & barbers. men-u ultra concentrates with a high % of modern, active ingredients offers a revolutionary line of high-performance mens shaving products that are different and make a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What can be said? Well packaged. Quick shipping. Easy to utilize. Smooth shave. Good, clean scent. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shaving cream I have found!!
reviews.reviewText: One pump works great for my whole face. I have sensitive skin and only shave 1-2x per week. This gives me almost no irritation or ingrown hairs. Smells great and just a little bit works. Easy to rinse too. Absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A superb shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: I have been using many different MenU products, and ordered here when my local salon was slow to reorder. Not only is the quality terrific but the packaging is ideal for people who frequently fly. This is a superb shaving cream, doesn't clog the razor, and offers less friction than others I have tried. It is also nicely concentrated and lasts and lasts...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does what it says.
reviews.reviewText: I found that the Men-u shaving cream does what it says. With just 2 pumps it makes enough lather to shave at least 2 times. My problem I have with it is by the time I apply the cream to my face the lather starts to dissolve and by the time I get to the other side of my face the lather has become very thin. I have tried adding water, removing water, adding more cream and I still end up with the same scenario. The other thing I have noticed is, with my skin when I shave with the Men-u it feels sticky which does not allow my razor to slide smoothly down my face. If you are debating on trying this I would say to give it a try. Maybe it will work better for you. It does make a lot of lather and it did work better then some of the creams I tried, I just found something that works better for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Well with Blade and with Electric Shaver
reviews.reviewText: Over the years I've tried a variety of shaving techniques--blade and electric--to achieve a close shave without lacerating myself. Eventually I developed a routine of doing a "preshave" with an electric shaver (various brands), following up with a blade shave. For about the last year and a half I've been using Men-u Shave cream, applying one pumpful on my dry beard, wetting the foil of a Panasonic wet/dry shaver, and then shaving. This cuts the electric shave time in about half. I follow that with another pumpful of shave cream and do a blade shave. This has solved the laceration problem, and the blades, of course, last much longer. The cream has a fresh fragrance. The other thing I like about the Men-u product is that is TSA compliant, and the locking mechanism stops the pump from activating while in transit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2013
reviews.reviewText: I've had to try different shaving creams since Peter Thomas Roth dropped its men's shaving line. I'm quite impressed with this product. This is super-concentrated...one pump covers my entire face and neck. It lubricates really well, provides for a very close shave, and has enough "stay" to allow several passes with the razor. There is no fragrance to speak of, rinses off my face well, and doesn't clog my razor. The container is solidly designed for carryon travel. There are more expensive products out their, but I doubt you'll find a closer shave.I'm waiting to see just how long the bottle lasts, and will update with results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I trialed it at first, then switched completely from cans of gel
reviews.reviewText: First, let share that my perspective of shaving is pretty simple. I don't uses brushes, bowls or really any fancy shaving products or other men's products. I just want a close, but quick shave, and I have a tougher than average beard. And I travel about 30% of the time. This has become my one shave cream for both home and my always packed duplicate travel kit.Compared to gels which foam up quite a bit, this is a much thinner, "see through" coating on your face. At first that made me skeptical, but I quickly found it was every bit as effective as even the best brands of canned gel shave creams but has a few key benefits over the cans.1) because it is almost "see through" you can actually shave more carefully.2) because you use so much less "volume" it makes much less mess around the sink.3) the container doesn't leave rust stains or cream drippings from the spout on my bathroom closet shelf, and takes up way less space.4) the small size is perfect for airline travel, and I never have to guess or worry if there is enough left in my travel bottle to get through a whole trip, whereas with a can I never really knew how much was left once below a half can.Lastly, I have found that when I have used up 90% or so of the pump bottle that is I run a little bit of tap back into the bottle I can still get another 25 or so shaves. I really don't think this costs more per shave than drugstore gels, or if so, it's marginal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars men-ü High-Performance Shave Cream
reviews.reviewText: Basically this is a great product and for travelling it is great. The nozzle is twisted to lock the pump and prevent any dopp kit accidents.

reviews.reviewTitle: I have tried 7 different shaving creams this year. This one was the most slick and pleasant to use.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried 7 different shaving creams this year. This one was the most slick and pleasant to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Best shave that I have every had!
reviews.reviewText: I have always used a wet razor shave. Found this product on Amazon and thought that I would try it.Well, it is the best wet shave that I have ever had. Instructions are very easy to follow.Did not wet hair, a very, very small amount on the palm of my hand and just rub it on. It was amazing for such a small quantity. Had a great shave and the best one I have ever had!It also means that I no longer have to wet my hair first and the use shaving soap & shaving brush.Also less and easier to pack and use when away.Recommend this product and it is good for those who shave their head - MagicWill definately buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It performs better than ‘standard’ foams / gels and compares well with ‘high-end’ shaving creams. A little certainly goes a long way - good value.

I've tried many expensive brands of shave soaps, creams and gals. This is by far, the best one. Lubrication is maintained for a long period of time after lathering. It's smooth and moist. Pump is easy to operate, and the pump locks and unlocks securely and easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 16, 2023
